title: What’s in a number?
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

Our guest this week has a message for high school seniors and their parents who are poring over the latest college rankings lists: Put ‘em down. Alexander McCormick, director of the National Survey of Student Engagement (NSSE) says there’s almost no correlation between the ranking of a school and the factors that go into a good college experience.

","type":"text/html"},{"content":"
","type":"text/html"},{"type":"text/html","content":"

 

"},{"content":"
","type":"text/html"}]
contentencoded: Our guest this week has a message for high school seniors and their parents who are poring over the latest college rankings lists: Put ‘em down. Alexander McCormick, director of the National Survey of Student Engagement (NSSE) says there’s almost no correlation between the ranking of a school and the factors that go into a good college experience.
